statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 9 \\ -16 \\ -17 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 17 \\ -15 \\ 12 \\ 21 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -33 \\ 30 \\ -28 \\ -44 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 3 \\ 12 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
